item.kubejs.philosophy_soul.desc: A drop from the self, carrying an indescribable sense of familiarity...
item.kubejs.jewel_star.desc: Under the impact of magical torrents, the internal lattice of the gem slowly changes... until it merges into one.
item.kubejs.mini_blackhole.desc: When holding this weight of ten thousand jun in the palm, it feels like the silhouette of the Creator lifting the world...
item.kubejs.universe_passport.desc: My heart and actions are as clear as a mirror, all deeds are for justice.
item.kubejs.unawaken_creative_core.desc: It's right here... as if only a step away...
item.kubejs.star.desc: After being blessed by gaia, the powerful force transforms into a mirror-like calm ocean.
item.kubejs.infinity.desc: The product of fusion, but the power is not yet fully controllable. If forcibly worn at this time, the power of the equipment will backfire.
